question.title: Error While trying to create idempiere in a kubernaes cluster
question.body:
Long story short, our company had a idempiere (with a little custom) in a docker runtime environment it works totally fine. But, when we want to migrate it into our kubernates cluster, but we face some issues.

First,

Setting myEnvironment .... =================================== ││ Starting iDempiere Server ││ =================================== ││ OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: ignoring option MaxPermSize=256m; support was removed in 8.0
││ An error has occurred. See the log file ││ /opt/idempiere/configuration/1745458786367.log.

in the containers log, there is this error.

Second,

java.version=1.8.0_292

BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86_64, WS=gtk, NL=en_US

Command-line arguments:  -application org.adempiere.server.application

When i try to see the log, there is a bunch whole of error.

Can anyone help me to solve this issues.

question_comments.body: The missing Java package javax.servlet might be part of the Java with which iDempiere is run in the Docker container, but not of the Java used to run iDempiere in the Kubernates cluster.
Check if all volumes that contain iDempiere plugins (especially under /opt/idempiere/plugins and /opt/idempiere/configuration) are properly mounted in your Kubernetes deployment.
